scripts.test:ts-node: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings" npx mcr ts-node ./src/example.ts -o coverage-reports/ts-node
scripts.test:mocha: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --no-warnings" npx mcr mocha ./test/**/*.ts -o coverage-reports/mocha
scripts.test: npm run test:ts-node && npm run test:mocha
